plot: Melinda must face the Headless Horseman at Halloween.

Jim and Melinda worry when both her and Aiden's dream time is haunted by a headless horseman, from the novel Legend of Sleepy Hollow, which Aiden's teacher Caroline Mayhew bans from school. It becomes clear that the figure is in fact the ghost of Sean Flannery, who fell to his death fleeing on one of the horses he had cared for as stable-boy at Caroline's strict father's farm when they were young, forbidden lovers, planning to elope, cloaked in Halloween costumes.—KGF Vissers
